data.title: Just ok...
data.text: We actually went to the location on 6th street but they are all owned by the same people.  I had a glazed cake and chocolate long john and it just wasn't my thing.  I usually prefer a donut with a crisp outer surface and these were very soggy.  But I have to say, based on the size of the crowd on a Saturday morning, I was the only one not impressed.

data.title: BEST Donuts in Springfield since the early 1960s
data.text: Fresh, light donuts...glazed, filled with cream, pudding, jelly, etc. with all sorts of toppings plus good coffee.  Go early cuz they sell out FAST!

data.title: Best old fasioneds anywhere!
data.text: Its our local donut shop, but we have tried other places in town, and nothing compares......they don't have to offer any gimmicks, or deals to get you to purchase, they are just that good!!

data.title: Best doughnuts ever
data.text: Hands down, the very best doughnuts in Springfield.  They are only open in the morning hours, but that's ok.  We all know you have to get there before noon to get a great doughnut.

data.title: Great Donuts
data.text:
I'm not from Springfield but my Dad was born and raised here and have been coming up to Springfield since I was a little one (I'm 57 now.)  Peases candy and Mel O Creme donuts, especially the Rasberry White iced bismarks, happy memories.
The rasberry filling is incredible.  I've tasted none like it before.  5 stars from me.

data.title: Always seem "day old"
data.text: People in Springfield LOVE these donuts.  I think it's because they never had really fresh donuts.  I've been to places where they are still warm and very soft.  These are never that fresh for some reason.  For a quick snack they are OK.  If I am taking them to a meeting or something i will go to where the donuts seem fresh.  The prices have become very high also.  Another reason to look around for an alternative.

data.title: ONE OF THE BEST DONUTS YOU WILL EVER EAT!!!!
data.text: I'm a Springfield native (moved away in 2004), and everytime I'm back in town, I grab some Mel-O-Cream donuts!!!  I especially like the Bismarcks and the spice cake donuts.  You really can't go wrong with anything you order from here though, as I have been eating here since birth, I have literally tried every donut style that they make here.  Now....by chance if you are an out-of-towner, and expecting some kind of weird, gourmet, gluten-free donuts, or some kind of wacky donuts with cereal on top, or something like that, you will sadly be disappointed, because this isn't one of those kind of places.  Nope...this is your old-school, soft, melt in your mouth, delicious donuts that have been around for generations.  This is definitely a Springfield Institution, and doesn't need any fru-fru stuff to attract newbies.  Their reputation speaks for themselves!!!  I don't know if it's been around for 100 years or not, but I assume it's pretty close to that.  Anyways, yes...good donuts as always.  I will ALWAYS come back to Mel-O-Cream whenever I'm in town!!!

data.title: The best anywhere
data.text:
Quite simply, if you come to Springfield, like donuts, and don't pay a visit to this place, you have wasted your trip.

The old fashioned glazed donut here is without question the single best donut I have ever eaten anywhere in the world. Period.

data.title: Classic Mel-O-Cream
data.text: This is the donut to have when you are in Springfield IL. The local, homemade favorite for generations.

data.title: GROSS
data.text: Drove up one morning around 10 to pick up a few donuts for school.  As I approached the door, the woman SMOKING right in front of the doorway threw her cigarette to the ground, stomped on it, and walked back inside and behind the counter to help me.  I was so disgusted, I stared down at the three trays of stale looking donuts left, then left.  NASTY.

data.title: Best donuts around!
data.text: I will always choose melo cream over Any other donut place within 90 miles. Simply put. Best donuts I have ever had.

data.title: Melo-o-cream is the king of all donuts
data.text: There is simply no other donut on earth that compares to these.  They are so light in texture....don't know how they do it!  I love the chocolate cream filled or the honeymooner!  The cinnamon swirl are really good too....even the basic glazed and long johns are top notch. My grandson recently requested their donuts instead of cake at his birthday party!

data.title: melo yellow
data.text: Best darn donuts around !  You must try these. Glazed, chocolate long johns and glazed french are my favorites, Good coffee and fast service to boot!

data.title: A donut is a donut is a donut!
data.text: I couldn't wait to try these spectacular donuts!  Uh, they are just regular donuts!  I expected something  special, gourmet, fancy, different....nope.

data.title: Best Donuts in the world!!
data.text: Locally owned, fresh baked daily, lots of choices.  If you cannot find a donut you like, you just don't like donuts.

data.title: Excellent donuts and friendly service
data.text: We had hoped to have breakfast at Café Moxo, but they were closed on Memorial Day.  Our second choice was Mel-O-Cream, and it did not disappoint.  A banner on the building noted they are celebrating their 80th anniversary.  My husband and I tried four different donuts, and they were all excellent.  The male and female working the counter were very friendly and helpful. If we lived near Springfield, I'm sure Mel-O-Cream would be our donut of choice.

data.title: Simply the BEST!!
data.text: Mel-O-Cream makes the absolute best donuts ever!  Soft and fresh, love their frostings and cremes.  My favs are their cinnamon rolls, chocolate old fashioned, coconut creme filled, and long johns, but I would gladly take any kind because they are all delicious.  Not sure what their long-time family recipe is for these treats, but they are far better than Krispy Kreme or Dunkin' Donuts!  Plus, they are locally owned and have been supporting our community for 80 years!  Believe me when I say it is pure pleasure to support this local business.  YUM!!!

data.title: BEST Donuts...None Better
data.text: I love donuts and eat as many as I can wherever I go!  Far and none, the best tasting donut in a variety of textures and flavor are Springfield, IL Mel-O-Cream!  Travelers, give them a try...they are the best.

data.title: Mel-O-creme are the best on the planet
data.text: Their secret recipe makes these the best donut ever!  If you are from out of town you must try at least one (you won't be able to stop at one though). These are the lightest and fluffiest donuts ever.  The icings and fillings are heavenly. These are the donuts that Homer Simpson dreams about!

data.title: Mel-o-Cream has the best donuts, ever!
data.text: I was raised in Springfield, and go back about 6 times a year.  Just can't go home without stopping at the Mel-O-Cream on Fifth Street.  When my husband and I are on our way out of town, the last thing we do is drop in to Mel-o-Cream for a large mug of their delicious coffee and a box of donuts to take home,  And, if we are lucky enough to have any left, when we get home, we freeze them and hoard them for as long as we can.  This trip, we got our coffee, and enough donuts to make it home and to the freezer. The donuts are not greasy, and there are so many kinds to choose from.  So much better than Krispy Kreme ever thought about tasting.
